titleStmt.title: The mappe of mans mortality and vanity A sermon, preached at the solemne funerall of Abraham Iacob Esquire, in the church of St. Leonards-Bromley by Stratford-Bow. May. 8. 1629. By Edmund Layfielde Bachelour in Divinity, and preacher there.
titleStmt.author: Layfield, Edmund.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed [by Miles Flesher] for Nicolas Bourne, and are to be sold at his shop, at the south entrance of the Royall Exchange,

notesStmt.note: Running title reads: The map of mans mortalitie and vanitie.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: his shop, at the south entrance of the Royall Exchange
